name: ARUN KATHIRESAN
top_product: "My top product is strategic financial consulting and business advisory for entrepreneurs and corporations. Through BizWiz Consulting, I help businesses with compliance, taxation, funding strategies, and financial structuring to ensure sustainable growth. Whether it’s a startup looking for proper financial planning or an established business needing strategic insights, I provide solutions that drive profitability and efficiency
ideal_referral: My ideal referral is a business owner, startup founder, or corporate decision-maker who is looking for expert financial guidance, strategic business consulting, or compliance solutions. I’m also looking to connect with manufacturers, infrastructure developers, and service providers who need financial structuring, funding strategies, or operational efficiency improvements.
top_problem_solved: One of the top problems I’ve solved was for a business struggling with poor financial management and compliance issues, leading to cash flow crises and tax penalties. Through BizWiz Consulting, I conducted a deep financial restructuring, implemented better accounting controls, and optimized their tax planning. Within months, they turned profitable, secured funding for expansion, and avoided further penalties. This transformation not only saved their business but also set them on a path to long-term growth. It reinforced my belief that the right financial strategy can make or break a company!
my_favourite_bni_story: I once received a referral from a member I had only met twice. That connection led to not only a great client but also a close professional friendship. BNI taught me that consistent visibility builds credibility — and credibility brings incredible opportunities.

name: KAMALAKANNAN VELUSAMY
top_product: Shopify Website Development.
ideal_referral: A great referral for me is a business owner who says, “I know I need to market online, but I don’t have time or a proper strategy.” It could be a restaurant owner, a boutique, a real estate developer,D2C Brand owner or a manufacturer in Tamil Nadu who wants consistent visibility and growth on social media.
top_problem_solved: Most small business owners want to market online — but they face real problems: They hire freelancers who miss deadlines or don’t understand strategy. They run ads but get “likes,” not leads. Their social media looks active but doesn’t bring business. They need websites quickly but can’t find reliable teams. That’s where Social Guru steps in. We simplify digital marketing, deliver fast results, and help business owners focus on what they do best — running their business.
my_favourite_bni_story: My favourite BNI story is about how it transformed me. When I joined BNI, I came looking for business. But I found much more — mentors, friends, and a community that pushed me to grow as an entrepreneur. Today, I’ve built valuable partnerships, improved my communication, and expanded my network beyond what I imagined. That’s the true power of BNI.
